name: Wood
_comment_sound_speed: Sound speed in layer, m/s (1500-3300 range, anisotropic, using average 2400)
_comment_attenuation: Attenuation coefficient at 1 kHz, dB/m (0.2-0.8 dB/m/kHz range, using average 0.5)
source: Typical values for wet wood underwater - porous, fibrous, frequency selective
